text:
Rumours have been floating across that Sushant Singh Rajput had made her Kizie Aur Manny co-star Sanjana Sanghi uncomfortable with his'over-friendliness' and 'flirt' behavior. Releasing his messages on private chat with her, Sushant Singh had rubbished the allegations earlier. Now, Sanjana Sanghi has also dismissed the rumours said that the incident never took place.
Also Read: Sushant Singh Rajput Denies Sexually Harassing Co-Actor Sanjana Sanghi, Shares Chat Screenshots
She said he never misbehaved with her and reports claiming otherwise are "baseless".
A story started doing the rounds on social media about Sushant's alleged misconduct, forcing him to share the screenshot of his conversations with Sanjana where they are seen chatting about their experience of working on the project. Sanjana, who is making her Bollywood debut, said she was out of the country and just got to know about the allegations, which are untrue.
facebook
"On returning from a long trip to the US yesterday, I read several baseless and unfounded stories with respect to misconduct and misbehaviour on the sets of our film Kizie Aur Manny.
"I'd like to clarify that no such incident took place with me. Let's put an end to these conjectures," Sanjana wrote.

Mukesh Chhabra, meanwhile, has been suspended as the director of "Kizie Aur Manny" amid allegations of sexual misconduct.
